author: alefisico
body:
(Sorry to open a new PR, but #18832 is old already and it was a pain just to update it).

Update needed for using grooming techniques at HLT (previously incompatible with confdb). A brief summary of this PR:

Update FastjetJetProducer, and the classes affected by this change, with fillDescriptions method.
as discussed with @rappoccio @ferencek @ahinzmann @nhanvtran @jdolen @gkasieczka

addOnTests and runTheMatrix tests passed, here are the log files:
- https://cernbox.cern.ch/index.php/s/MLhMmXP5mVCkmth
- https://cernbox.cern.ch/index.php/s/gnYTrFQB5uDk9Ae
title: Updating FastjetJetProducer (and related producers) with fillDescriptions (version2)
